channel.title: CVE Feed for Eclipse Foundation -- Glassfish
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Eclipse Foundation -- Glassfish

item.title: CVE-2024-9329|2024-10-07T15:59:12.662Z -- eclipse%20foundation -- glassfish
item.description: In Eclipse Glassfish versions before 7.0.17, The Host HTTP parameter could cause the web application to redirect to the specified URL, when the requested endpoint is '/management/domain'. By modifying the URL value to a malicious site, an attacker may successfully launch a phishing scam and steal user credentials.
